alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 12:56AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, northwestern Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1255 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles southwest of Mayo to 17 miles west of Cross City to near Steinhatchee to 18 miles northwest of Horseshoe Point. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Cross City, Tennille, Shamrock, Hines, Jonesboro, Clara, Cross City Airport, Salem, Eugene, Carbur and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
